channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - August
item.description: A little later than usual, discover the latest happenings in the PrestaShop Project for August 2023. We had a productive month, successfully merging more than 240 pull requests and releasing PrestaShop 8.1.1 and some security patches. Read on to find out more!

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The eighth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, September 13th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? â€“ July 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, itâ€™s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in July.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - July 2023
item.description: Read about what has been going on in the PrestaShop Project in July 2023. It was a good month with over 340 merged pull requests! ðŸŽ‰

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.1 Is Available
item.description: The first patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available. This release contains a few security fixes, so we highly recommend you to upgrade your shop as soon as possible.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.5 Is Available
item.description: The fifth patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download! This release contains a few security fixes, so we highly recommend you to upgrade your shop as soon as possible.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.10 Is Available
item.description: A security patch for PrestaShop 1.7 is now available.

item.title: The PrestaShop Developer Conference is coming to Paris!
item.description: Are you a passionate PrestaShop developer or enthusiast, wanting to expand your knowledge and network within the community? The PrestaShop team is happy to let you know the call for presentations is open for the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place in Paris, France on November 30, 2023. This event promises to be an opportunity to engage in technical discussions, discover solutions, and connect with like-minded peers in the community.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - July 2023
item.description: The projectâ€™s live update was held for the seventh time this year and streamed live on July 19th, 2023.

item.title: Announcing July PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The seventh Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, July 19th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - June
item.description: The new PrestaShop 8.1, ongoing work on PrestaShop 9.0, new content in the developer documentation and more! Read about all this news in the Core Monthly report for June.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Is Available
item.description: We are pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.1 is officially available.

item.title: Freelance Developer and Translator: Meet SNor42
item.description: Have you ever wondered whoâ€™s hiding behind a Crowdin username? Itâ€™s time to find out! Contributor interviews are a great way of getting to know the people who participate in the PrestaShop project.
